org.mpxj

Class ProjectConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mpxj.ProjectConfig

  • public class ProjectConfig
extends Object
    Container for configuration details used to control the behaviour of the ProjectFile class.

      • getCompleteThroughIsNextWorkStart

        public boolean getCompleteThroughIsNextWorkStart()
        Returns true if a task's Complete Through attribute is reported as the time work can next start. Defaults to false. When set to true this matches the behaviour of MS Project versions prior to 2007.
        Returns:
        true if Complete Through is next work start date

      • setCompleteThroughIsNextWorkStart

        public void setCompleteThroughIsNextWorkStart(boolean completeThroughIsNextWorkStart)
        When set to true a task's Complete Through attribute is reported as the time work can next start. Defaults to false. When set to true this matches the behaviour of MS Project versions prior to 2007.
        Parameters:
        completeThroughIsNextWorkStart - true if Complete Through is next work start date

      • getBaselineStrategy

        public BaselineStrategy getBaselineStrategy()
        Retrieve the strategy used by this project to populate baseline attributes from another schedule.
        Returns:
        baseline strategy

      • setBaselineStrategy

        public void setBaselineStrategy(BaselineStrategy strategy)
        Set the strategy used by this project to populate baseline attributes from another schedule.
        Parameters:
        strategy - baseline strategy

      • setSubprojectWorkingDirectory

        public void setSubprojectWorkingDirectory(File workingDirectory)
        Specify a directory to use when searching for subproject files to expand. MPXJ will attempt to use the full path of a subproject when attempting to expand it, or the process working directory. If a value is supplied here, this directory will be used instead of the process working directory.
        Parameters:
        workingDirectory - directory to search for subproject files

      • getSubprojectWorkingDirectory

        public File getSubprojectWorkingDirectory()
        Retrieve the directory to search for subproject files.
        Returns:
        directory to search for subproject files
